ygData.subject: Mistmoore Faction (was: najena faction)
ygData.msgSnippet: Someone here (Beld?) posted the best way to increase Mistmoore Faction is to kill the true Highelf Princess at the top of the tower behind the false wall with
ygData.messageBody:
Someone here (Beld?) posted the best way to increase Mistmoore Faction is to
kill the true Highelf Princess at the top of the tower behind the false wall
with the picture.

Beld, if you posted this, could you repost it again? thanks.

--
Setekh <Dark Omen>
5th Season DE Rogue
Bertoxx
--
Akenar "Cronik" Khaos <Dark Omen>
15th Season TSK
Left Hand of Thule the Pain Bringer
Bertoxx



----- Original Message -----
From: Krukhan Garabash <krukhan@...>
To: <shadowknight@onelist.com>
Sent: Tuesday, November 02, 1999 2:39 PM
Subject: Re: [shadowknight] najena faction


| From: "Krukhan Garabash" <krukhan@...>
|
| is it even possible to have good najena faction? i've never seen a
positive
| adjustment.
|
| as a side note, i've never killed a mistmoore npc but i have killed easily
| 100+ bards for +MayongMistmoore hits. i am still 100% kos, scowls at you
| ready to attack in MistMoore. the faction there is broken imo. also, when
i
| went to turn the parts in mistmoore: first, a shadowy scribe cast force
| shocked me to death through a wall as i was leaving. second, after i
| collected my body i made my way all the way to the castle gates...the
guards
| were positioned in such a way that my troll absolutely could not fit past
| them. though i did manage to get stuck in a crouch position between
| them...then watched as my invis died. needless to say, i died shortly
after.
|
| so, if you go to mistmoree bring a rescue group and bind in gfay (i was
| bound in grobb) as the zone is bugged to hell and back.
|
| kg
|
|
| >From: Grant Vanderhule <vandergm@...>
| >Reply-To: shadowknight@onelist.com
| >To: shadowknight@onelist.com
| >Subject: [shadowknight] najena faction
| >Date: Tue, 2 Nov 1999 15:13:02 -0600
| >
| >luckily, the undead knight (the guy who makes shadow knight armor) has
| >temple of solusek ro faction, NOT najena faction. so you can kill stuff
in
| >najena to your hearts content and he'll still like you. HOWEVER, since he

| >appears in drelzna's room... it would be nice to have high najena faction
| >so
| >you can survive the trip down there a bit more easily!
| >
| >Beld Demonblade
